MS MCQs

    Create a Power Automate button without user input

    »

    1. Which additional feature does the Convert time zone action have?

      Convert from Eastern Time (US & Canada) to Pacific Time (US & Canada)

      Change the format to General date/time pattern (short time)

      Convert time zone and the format

      Convert from Eastern Time (US & Canada) to Greenland time


    2. Which of the following options can you add triggers to in a button flow?

      Triggers can’t be added to button flows.

      Triggers can be added only to actions.

      Triggers can be added to actions and conditions.

      Triggers can be added only to conditions.


    3. What is the input requirement for the Get Manager connector to work?

      Your City or Full address information

      User principal name or email ID

      Timestamp

      Full address, Date, and Timestamp


    4. If a user property such as city or phone number is missing, where can you update this information?

      In Azure Active Directory or Office 365 User

      In Power Apps

      In the Power Automate Admin center

      In both Power Automate and Power Apps Admin. center
